mapper.sql: rowid, FILE_CODE, EMPLOYEECODE, READ_DATE, LEAVE_DATE, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG, REMARKS
mapper.insert: insert into km_study_read (rowid, FILE_CODE, EMPLOYEECODE, READ_DATE, LEAVE_DATE, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG, REMARKS) values (#{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{readDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leaveDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

rowid,

mapper.update:
update km_study_read
FILE_CODE = #{fileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMPLOYEECODE = #{employeecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
READ_DATE = #{readDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEAVE_DATE = #{leaveDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_CREATE_TIME = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_DELETE_TIME = #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update km_study_read set FILE_CODE = #{fileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMPLOYEECODE = #{employeecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, READ_DATE = #{readDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEAVE_DATE = #{leaveDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_CREATE_TIME = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_DELETE_TIME = #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

UPDATE km_base SET READ_CNT = ( SELECT count(1) FROM ( SELECT ( UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.LEAVE_DATE) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.READ_DATE) ) / 60 duration FROM km_study_read b WHERE b.FILE_CODE = #{fileCode} ) c WHERE c.duration >= 1 ) WHERE FILE_CODE = #{fileCode}
